entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dauphin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dauphin Airport 9:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -20.2°C
Pressure: 104.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: W 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
